fields.title: AI Camera Scanning
fields.description: Point your phone at food, medicine, documents, or workout equipment and let AI identify it and suggest actions. Supports 8 categories with smart routing to the right module.

fields.title: Medicine Tracking
fields.description: Comprehensive medicine management with daily tracker, schedules, adherence stats, refill alerts, and PRN support. One-tap check-off for doses.

fields.title: Nutrition & Food Tracking
fields.description: Log meals with macro tracking, daily summaries, and nutrition goals. Includes custom foods, meal type categorization, and eating context tracking.

fields.title: Enhanced Dashboard
fields.description: Dashboard now shows Today's Medicine Schedule with status badges, Recent Workouts with PR highlights, and Quick Stats for medicine doses and workout counts.

fields.title: AI Camera Source Tracking
fields.description: Entries created via AI Camera now show a camera badge on detail pages. Track which entries came from AI-powered scanning.

fields.title: Security Improvements
fields.description: Enhanced security with rate limiting, secure admin URL, improved cookie settings, and server-side API key handling for Bible lookups.

fields.title: Onboarding Wizard
fields.description: New users are guided through a friendly 6-step wizard to personalize their experience - choose theme, enable modules, configure AI coaching, and set location.

fields.title: Scripture Library
fields.description: Save, edit, and organize your favorite Scripture verses in a personal library. Add themes and personal notes to each verse.

fields.title: AI Coaching Styles
fields.description: Choose how the AI communicates with you. Pick from 7 styles including Supportive Partner, Direct Coach, Gentle Guide, and more.

fields.title: Task Undo
fields.description: Accidentally marked a task complete? Now you can easily undo with a single click using the new Undo link.

fields.title: Fitness Tracking
fields.description: Track workouts, log exercises, and monitor your fitness journey with comprehensive workout logging.

fields.title: Journal Prompts
fields.description: 20 curated writing prompts across 8 categories to inspire your daily reflections. Get a random prompt with one click.

fields.title: Life Module
fields.description: Manage your whole life with Projects, Tasks, Calendar, Inventory, Pets, Recipes, Maintenance logs, and Document storage.

fields.title: Purpose Module
fields.description: Set your annual direction with Word of the Year, life goals, change intentions, and seasonal reflections.
